org.eclipse.dataset

Class Slice

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.dataset.Slice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Slice
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
    Class to represent a slice through a single dimension of a multi-dimensional dataset. A slice comprises a starting position, a stopping position (not included) and a stepping size.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
